entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:45 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:45 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
